reviews.review: i saw this game and tryed it myself

I would have to say that this has got to be one of the greatest, if not THE greatest, game of the 7th Gen Consoles.  If you're thinking of buying this, then you absolutely have to.  It's an amazing game, the graphics are incredible, gameplay is nearly flawless, and the storyline is outstanding.  All-in-all, this is one of the games you have to play.  Otherwise, you're missing out!

masterpiece

One of the best FPS game ever. 

Great graphic, creative gameplay like the flying around the battlefield with a hook. Giving you hardcore gun shooting, summoning magic and stealth action at the same time. I have no idea how I can express it but so far this is one of the most fluent gameplay I have EVER. The flow is so smooth that hours will pass in a blink. 

But the best point is OMG that MIND BLOWING STORYLINE. Terrific and Exceptional. If you like something deep and huuuuge plottwist you will be addicted to it. It's just like some creepyass brain chewing gum sticking in your damn mind. If you are looking for a shooter with a thrilling plot, GRAB THIS NOW!! This is your choice. I owned couple of games and this, my first game ever bought, is still the most worthwhile one. 

10/10

[h1] Where do I even begin... [/h1]

This game is absolutely sunning visually, the story is beyond phenomenal, [b]I don't have the words to describe how well it's crafted and how absolutely mind-blowing it is.[/b] This game is intricate, philosophical, intelligent, challenging, entertaining, thought-provoking and everything else you could possibly use to describe a story beyond words. 

If you're a fan of Christopher Nolan and movies such as Inception, Interstellar and the like, then you'll for sure love this game. 

[b] I cannot recommend this enough. [/b] It tackles so many prevalent issues that mankind faces, and it does it in such a fun, engaging way. 10/10 - Perfect game in my opinion.

11/10

Bioshock Infinite, where do I start It is truly an eye opening single player game from start to finish it makes you think about what will happen next what new adventure will guide your path or even what will be your final checkpoint which is the scariest part over all. Playing this game besides the amazing picture and beautiful storyline it also implements a type of vibe that will keep you hooked and I truly believe that the largest contributer to this sense of completion is the soundtrack presented into the game. As for the recomendation on this game I give it a 9.5/10 it is simply a masterpiece crafted from Irrational Games. 

I as well will list the pro's and con's that I feel fit tword this beauty. 

[i] Pros: [/i]
- Amazing storyline 
- Beautiful graphics 
- Attaching soundtrack
- Attaching characters 
- Fair combat and movement 
- Impressive bosses and challenges
- Long campaign to keep you hooked 
- Beautiful cutscenes 

[i] Cons: [/i]
- Some issues with game crashing or freezing 


Other then that I honestly would not change a single thing about it this game builds the foundation for following single player adventure games past its release it is a work of art that none other can match I began with the amazing first two titles of The Rapture we all love and then fluctuated into this iconic setting as well. I hope for the next time one desires to purchase an adventurous single player game I recommend Bioschock Infinite as your chocie. Thank you for reading have a blessed day.

Kurz und knapp: Das Ende war so krass, wie ich es nicht für möglich gehalten habe. Ohne zu spoilern, es hat mich emotional mitgenommen. Ende!
Die Story sieht auf den ersten Blick sehr knapp aus, auf den zweiten Blick ist sie es aber nicht. Eine sehr schöne und auch actionreiche handlung.
Ich finde es schade, dass es schon vorbei ist. Man möchte einfach alles vergessen und es wieder zum ersten Mal spielen!!!

Bioshock infinite  is a first person shooter  with a rather complicated story .  But game play consist of  kill   all enemy's in area advance to next  area etc.  As with most first person shooter's  The thing that makes this shooter a bit different is the  AI partner Elisabeth. She follows you around and gives you ammo and bullets etc. . The game   ends in a very strange way   The  game  ending  has a     23 . minute   and   31    second  Video explanation  on the gaming website  IGN  which references the other games in the series.  Yes the ending is that complicated . The major complaint in the negative reviews seem to be  game mechanics  and the difficulty of the game . I did not have any problems with this but be aware. 32.99 Is a bit pricey for this game It is an older game so  I suggest to put it on your wish list and wait for a sale .     
   Also for those wondering   this game and the DLC  has zero sexual content .  You get to hold Elisabeth's hand that is it.  
    
DLC    
    
Clash in the Clouds   This has    no story line  . It gives you some added game play. But with no story line Elisabeth is almost mute in this   . Has things in it like  try to kill all   enemy's using   x type of attack to gain points. Upgrades .  It looks like there was some failed attempt at trying to  have some sort of on line gaming  thing. Happening  PVP on line gaming is  not my thing. But from a look at the player boards in the game servers are either empty or nonexistent .     
    
    
    
Burial at sea  1 and 2    
    
    
Interesting story   But has  a really cheesy   intro IM sure all I have to say is the words dame' cigarette and detective office  You will get it . The second part of which you get to play as Elisabeth however  strange ending similar to the ending for the main game  ,  but if you enjoyed the main game you might like this DLC     
    
    
Columbia's Finest  upgrades and  extra weapons   no story line

Довольно примитивный шутер со скучным сюжетом, который завершается не самой очевидной концовкой. Куча бесполезных магических напитков. Пройти можно и без них. Куча однообразных пушек. Стрельба примитивная. Противники не слишком умные.  Удовольствия от процесса не получил, потому что ожидал намного большего.

BioShock Infinite стала для меня первой игрой из этой серии. Порекомендовал мне её друг, аргументируя, что там великолепный сюжет.
Я был настроен скептически на эту игру, в детстве, еще с выходом первой части я проиграл в неё час и закрыл, чем-то испугала она меня.
Когда начал играть в неё, после пару часов игры, меня постиг эффект НИ-ФИ-ГА-СЕ-БЕ. Этот эффект держал меня к концу игры, но в финале у меня вообще голову снесло. Спойлерить не буду. Игра держит вас всем: геймплей, озвучка, стилистика игры и уровней, но самое главное-это СЮЖЕТ. Если у вас приоритетом стоит сюжет, а только потом "графон"- смело берите эту игру. Геймплей, озвучка и графика будут приятными бонусами в этой игре.
reminds me of my childhood

"A really dumbed-down Bioshock game" is not enough to describe it. 
After watching all those amazing E3 trailers showing all emotional and weird stuff that was supposed to happen in this game I was so amazed and now I am regretting even purchasing this game. 
Let's start with the fact how developers decided to kill a new fresh First Person Shooter idea that was Bishock 1 and 2 just to make another generic Modern Military Shooter for quick buck without any sort of effort:

>dull gameplay based around hidding behind covers and enemies with ton of health because a player is too dumb to enjoy a game that takes less than 12 hours to finish

>constantly losing a control over your character because a player is too dumb to play a video game without cinematic experience

>"press this button to progress" every few minutes, even during cutscene and conversations because a player is too dumb to pay attention otherwise

>choices doesn't matter because a player is too dumb to understand them

>checkpoints every 2 minutes because a player is too dumb to have some sort of challenge

>regenerating shield because a player is too dumb to use healthpacks

>2 gun limitation because a player is too dumb to use multiple guns

>very small amount of maximimum ammo because a player is too dumb to use a gun that he want for a longer time

>5 out of 8 powers are just stun because a player is too dumb to use more unique powers

>laughable variety of enemies because a player is too dumb to fight something different than a human with a gun

>only 2 enemies in game use "powers" that are advertised all over the city because a player is too dumb to complain about world consistency

>slow reloading and enemies barely twitch after being shot because a player is too dumb to understand what a good gunplay means 

>tons of copy pasted generic guns because a player is too dumb to use something different than another shotgun or rifle

>upgrading multiple weapons makes no sense because a player is too dumb to use more than 2 guns at once

>very limited customization of passive upgrades because a player is too dumb to have a bigger choice

>open area and map are replaced with tight corridors and simple navigation arrow making exploration minimalistic or worthless because a player is too dumb for exploration

>no side content because a player is too dumb care about those

>Elizabeth is a meaningless character that give us no reason to care about her for a whole game and cannot even die because a player is too dumb to protect this moving dispenser

>existence of magic and fighting ghosts with bullets because a player is too dumb to complain about McGuffins and story inconsistency

>cliche boring story filled with plot holes, terrible dialogue, meaningless choices, a message "racism is bad" that goes literally nowhere with ending so bad that creates a time paradox because a player is too dumb to understand and complain about script and its plotholes

>no different types of ammo because a player is too dumb to switch between them

>hacking removed because a player is too dumb for minigames 

>false advertisement because none of promises, E3 footage, Songbird, script, ideas or scenes such as horse resurrection are in the game and player is way too dumb to even remember or complain about that https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i_lN_7DsFIw



And in exchange for what? An NPC that gives you infinite health, salt, ammo, guns, money for free and revive on spot for a small fee?

Is that why this game is called "Infinite"? 
Then why its called "Bioshock" when the game has nothing to do with Bioshock gameplay?

Oh, there is also "1999" difficulty but all it do is give less ammo, respawn cost more money, enemies are more bullet sponge and deal more damage to you.
That means you will have LESS chance to buy upgrades and powers while you will hide behind covers way MORE often. Does that sound like fun for you?

Wouldn't be better if this difficulty did something different? Like adding more types of enemies using powers and other real challenges that would make actually in game difference and give some replayability to this game? 
Oh, its just me thinking that? Alright.

Wasn't this franchise supposed to be about unique gameplay that is not just like any other modern shooters, advanced technology, gene manipulations and how it can lead to disasters anyway?

Nope, instead we get easy predictable story with a "racism is bad" that gets drop in the first half of the game for sake of plot about different universes that also goes nowhere.
Oh, wanna finish this so-called "story", eh? 
Well then be ready to buy all horrible DLC's that clearly feels like they was cut out from main game just to be later sold.

Bioshock 1 and 2 gave us gameplay affecting moral choices and multiple endings. 
Infinite gave us a lesson that your choices means nothing and there is just one ending

No wonder that studio don't want to make another Bioshock after this because greed killed this franchise just like it did with Mass Effect, Duke Nukem and Dead Space. 

I enjoyed Bioshock 1 and 2 for being unique games unlike majority of shooters available on the market and because of all those changes - I really hate Infinite.

Same story with Duke Nukem Forever - they did want to create more simple, dumbed down game that works both on consoles and PC. 

I dont mind that but why did they had to change so much franchis formula with already two game in the franchise (also available on consoles) that not only was very popular but also praised by both fans and critics for its uniqueness

So why this game is called "Bioshock"? 
 
Oh, I know why - because it was way cheaper to make a sequel to critically acclaimed games than making a new IP. "Easy money from blind fans" as developers and publishers say. 
That why this garbage still have "mostly positive" reviews I guess.

They could at least make this game a co-op Bioshock for 2 players.
Imagine that - one play as Booker and other as Elizabeth, each have own skills, guns and own paths making game worth of playing as both sides to see everything.
Elizabeth could use her "magical" tear making powers to collect items or give them to Booker when Booker have his own gimmicks but no - that would be too good and unique idea for this game

Also it would require way too much testing and we had to rush this game into stores, guys. Thats why we need another generic shooter instead - they are way cheaper and faster to make than well crafted, detailed shooters with fresh, original ideas.

Definitely my worst game of 2013. 
What a huge disappointment after all that years of hyping up product by greedy corporations.

I expected a step forward from a sequel to Bioshock 2, not 10 steps backwards perfectly showing-off that there is no place for innovations in First Person Shooter genre.

I am really glad that games like Doom, Wolfenstein and Serious Sam exist and proves that there is still place on this market for more fun First Person Shooters.
Those games gives me hope that developers will stop with this "everything is Call of Duty/Halo" ambition.

I did want to play a Bioshock game that was promised to me by E3, all those trailers and interviews. Instead I got another heavy scripted Modern Military Shooter. 

Is this wrong that I expected a Bioshock game to have....well, more Bioshock in it?
Unfortuned, I got way less of it. 

But my biggest pain in all that is how many people are praising games such as Bioshock Infinite as a masterpiece because this send a message to developers and publishers that people want more dull shooters every year that insults players intelligence instead of good crafted shooters that respect players skill and time.



If you want a more elaborate critique of Bioshock Infinite, would you kindly watch this video which not only talk about everything I did just say but also more: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VdNhwb7iuI4

Acabo de terminar este juego y solo puedo decir,  que es un pedazo de juegos que todos debemos pasarnos al menos una vez.  En cuanto la jugabilidad para mí a sido de sobresaliente, el metodo de disparo y de las habilidades, así como el modo de apuntar en las armas, sin olvidarnos de las habilidades que va adquiriendo nuestro personaje. Durante todo el juego no he tenido ni bajadas de fps ni fallos técnicos y tampoco la inteligencia artificial de la coprotagonista ha sido mala, de hecho se ha comportado perfectamente en todo momento. Por último si hablamos de la historia es estupenda y te va enganchando por momentos y el final... buenos digamos que te deja un poco con los pelos de punta. Así que no tengas dudas y compratelo, espera a las ofertas ya que se pone muy bien de precio, yo adquirí los 3 bioshock por 12 euros. A estos precios no lo dudes y disfruta de esta obra.

Bought all the games when infinite came out and ever since then it's been my favourite franchise.

Now for what I think;

The shooting is great according to me, I am currently using the sniper rifle and hand cannon as well as bucking bronco and shock jockey and I love it.
The vigors are fun and creative and easy to understand.
And the story is great, I could tell you why I love it but I do not wish to spoil it. 
Overall great, great game. I have replayed all of the bioshock games a ton. :]

Игра, на мой взгяд, замечтальная и потрясающая!
Очень красивый мир - весь этот город, парящий в воздухе, и элементы стимпанка неповторимы.
Отличная механика игра, которая является ответвлением механики классических Биошоков - каждый игрок наверняка найдет здесь свои любимые приемы.
Ну и, конечно, замечательные персонажи, которым по-настоящему сопереживаешь.
Потрясающий сюжет, который подхватывает игрока и персонажей и несет их через время и пространство к финалу игры. Да, игра абсолютна линейна в своем развитии, но ей это можно простить, поверьте. Два DLC Burial at Sea продолжают сюжет оригинала, имея несколько другую механику и возвращая нас в Восторг.
Третий DLC является набором арен, на которых нужно выполнять различные задания. В силу разнообразной механики это надоедает несильно.
На macOS игра идет хорошо, правда, приходится немного повозиться для локализвции игры на русский.

BioShock: The Collection è semplicemente il miglior acquisto che si possa fare su Steam. Questo capitolo corona una saga senza pari.

Ещё тогда, когда я не завёл себе стим и не покупал игры, я прошёл все части BioShock на пиратской версии. В первой понравился сюжет и она заставила побыстрее запустить вторую, которая разочаровала меня и заставила не запускать Infinite. Но я всё же вернулся к этой франшизе всего спустя неделю, так как восторженные отзывы не давали спокойно спать.
Третья часть BioShock потрясла своим сеттингом. Такой резкий контраст солнечной и открытой Колумбии и мрачного подводного Восторга. В отличие от первых частей, мы попадаем Колумбию в период своего расцвета. Можно несколько часов бродить по мощёным улочкам и разглядывать витрины магазинов, заглядывать в счастливые лица людей, но всё-равно где-то таится ощущение, что с этим городом не всё в порядке.
Через какой-то промежуток времени мы находим Элизабет и вот тут приходит понимание того, что игру делали профессиональные психологи. Так умело манипулировать сознанием игрока сможет не каждый. На проработку этого персонажа, я уверен, ушло немало средств и времени, но Кен Левин и его команда смогли достичь того, что планировали. Элизабет не ощущается как набор скриптов и текстур, она ощущается как живой человек, за которого ты готов сражаться до последнего патрона. Элизабет влюбляет в себя игрока и в какой-то момент игрок понимает, что не Букер главный герой игры, а Она. Задумка Irrational Games была в том, чтобы игрок олицетворял себя с Букером, чтобы сформировать такую сильную привязанность к Элизабет. Такое я вижу впервые.
Кроме того, Элизабет крайне полезна: кидает патроны, здоровье, деньги. Но что самое главное, никогда не путается под ногами, ведь это обычно то, что делают напарники в играх.
Как шутер игра не очень выдающаяся. Больше всего бесили двери, которые открывались только после полной зачистки комнаты. Ну и конечно же исчезающие противники в 2013 году.
От стрельбы можно получить удовольствие только если находить новые комбинации энергетиков (Колумбийские аналоги плазмидов) и оружия. Например, поднял в воздух толпу врагов одним энергетиком и смыл их за край Колумбии другим.
Сценаристы придумали такой сюжет, благодаря которому можно было бы клепать сиквелы и дополнения бесконечно и я очень рад, что этого не случилось, в дополнениях лишь связали первую часть и Infinite.
Игра безусловно достойна внимания, не как шутер, а как увлекательная история, после окончания которой сидишь в лёгком недоумении и разочаровании от того, что франшиза закончена.

Auch wenns am Anfang noch ganz unterhaltsam ist, wird es irgendwann schnell absolut langweilig und linear, jede CoD Kampange ist besser als das hier, ich  verstehe echt nicht was alle daran so toll finden...

Grafisch absolut fantastisch. Habe kaum je ein schöneres Spiel gespielt.

Auch die anfängliche Atmosphäre ist äußerst dicht - jedenfalls für die 1. Stunde im Spiel, während man sich noch im Tutorial (der Jahrmarkt) befindet.

Auch der Sound und die genial arrangierten Songs im Spiel haben mir sehr gefallen.

Aber sobald das Spiel in den Egoshooter wechselt, ist die gesamte Atmosphäre dahin.
Wer zum Geier hat denn in einem so hochkarätigen Spieleentwicklerteam die tolle Idee, einen absolut simplen Shooter aus diesem Spiel zu machen?

Alles, aber auch absolut alles, was bei System Shock und Bioshock 1 und 2 noch Spaß machte, ist entfernt worden. Es gibt keine Map mehr, man kann meistens sowieso nicht eigenwillig an vorher besuchte Orte zurückkehren. Man folgt ziemlich stur einem vorgegebenen Weg. 
Man kann Maschinen nicht mehr hacken (nur noch kurzzeitig umpolen), es gibt nicht mehr die Möglichkeit, dass man nach und nach lernt, welche Gegner empfindlich gegen welche Waffen sind. Nur noch simples Haudrauf-Shooting mit ein paar stupiden Zusatzkräften. Schlösser knacken übernimmt auch die Nebenfigur. 

Die grafische Umsetzung mit den Rissen, aus denen man sich im Kampf hilfreich bedienen kann, ob nun mit Medipacks, Salzen oder Bots, die auf die Feinde schießen, finde ich überhaupt nicht gelungen. 
Diese ständigen Blitze, die die Risse aussenden, lenkten mich immens vom Kampfgeschehen ab bzw. war es stellenweise nicht möglich, den oder die Angreifer überhaupt auszumachen, wenn sich in der Nähe einer dieser Risse befand. 

Dann kann man im Spiel nicht selbst speichern, sondern es wird immer automatisch gespeichert. Nun ist mein Rechner so schnell, dass ich das Speicher-Symbol oft gar nicht zu sehen bekomme. Daher weiß ich nie, wie viel der Story ich noch einmal spielen muß, wenn ich in den Optionen "Zum letzten Speicherpunkt zurückkehren" anklicke. Denn oft muß man sich dann auch ewig lange und langweilige Cutscenes/Gespräche nochmals antun. Zum Würgen!

Auch bin ich ständig an Treppenaufgängen und anderen Ecken im Spiel hängengeblieben. 3 Mal so heftig, dass ich nur neu starten konnte, weil außer Schießen ging gar nichts mehr. 
Ist schon toll, wenn man vor ein paar Snipern Deckung sucht, und dann wiederholt zu Tode geschossen wird, weil man wieder mal am Treppenlauf festhängt.

Und dann gibt es endlos viele Waffentypen im Spiel, aber man kann immer nur zwei mit sich herumtragen. Super, wenn man dann plötzlich den Feindeswellen gegenübersteht und eine Gatling Gun gebraucht hätte, sich vorher aber doch für den Karabiner entschieden hat, weil der im Kampf davor wesentlich praktischer war. Und das alles dann ohne eigene Speicherfunktion. PRIMA!

Es gibt noch hunderte anderer Dinge, die den Spielspaß so extrem runterschrauben, dass ich persönlich das Spiel zum Schluß nur noch gehasst habe. Ich habe es nur zu Ende gespielt, um zu erfahren, wie die Story ausgeht.

Die ist nämlich ganz gut durchdacht, wenngleich sie erst ganz zum Schluß wirklich Fahrt aufnimmt.

Alles in allem kann ich das Spiel für Freunde simpler Ego-Shooter durchaus empfehlen.

Aber für Spieler der Bioshock- und System-Shock-Serie ist dieses grafisch wirklich überragend brilliante Spiel anhand seiner aus meiner Sicht total mißlungenen Spielmechanik absolut nicht zu empfehlen.

Ich fand persönlich das Unterwasser-Setting in Rapture besser, trotzdem nen launiger Shooter mit einer sehr verwirrenden, aber guten Story und vielen Oha-Momenten. Auch die DLC lohnen. Bioshock ist halt ne gute marke

Oh. My. God. This is an absolutely BEUATIFUL game! Not only is the unique style of gameplay fascinating, the story line is absolutely to die for! One of the best games ever, right up there with The Last of Us.
Pretty aesthetic with an interesting theme, but both the gameplay & story feel uninspired. For a more fun singe-player FPS, I recommend Doom & Titanfall 2
Very Good

I never played the previous games so I went in blind based on the beauty of the trailers and high praise of the previous games. I am happy I did.

This game is a joy in both story/plot and graphics. You actually start to feel for the mains characters even if you were not expecting, and when the ending (twist) comes, you wish you could do something for the characters. 

Personally, I didn't like much the DLC, despite allowing me to see more of Elizabeth ;)
